The Nokia 105 (2022) is a simple, durable phone with a 1.77-inch display, long battery life, FM radio, and supports basic calling and SMS.
The Nokia 3310 is a durable phone with a 2.4-inch display, 2MP camera, long battery life, 2G support, and classic features like FM radio and Snake.
The Nokia 2660 Flip is a compact, easy-to-use flip phone with a 2.8-inch display, 0.3MP camera, large buttons, long battery life, and features like FM radio and 4G support.
The Nokia 5310 is a durable feature phone with a 2.4-inch display, 2MP camera, dedicated music buttons, FM radio, and long battery life.
The Nokia 8.3 5G has a 6.81-inch display, Snapdragon 765G, 64MP quad-camera, 5G support, and a 4,500mAh battery.
The Nokia 9 PureView features a 5.99-inch display, Snapdragon 845, and a unique penta-camera system with five 12MP sensors.
The Nokia 7.2 has a 6.3-inch display, Snapdragon 660, and a triple-camera system with a 48MP main sensor.
The Nokia 6.1 Plus features a 5.8-inch display, Snapdragon 636, dual-camera setup, and a sleek design.
The iPhone 11 has a 6.1-inch display, dual 12MP rear cameras, A13 Bionic chip, and is known for its reliable performance and good battery life.
The iPhone 14 Pro Max features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, triple 48MP rear cameras, and advanced features like ProMotion and improved battery life.
The iPhone 15 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A17 Pro chip, titanium frame, triple-camera system, 8GB RAM, and storage options of 128GB, 256GB, 512GB, or 1TB.
The iPhone 15 Pro Max has a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A17 Pro chip, titanium frame, a triple-camera system, 8GB RAM, and storage options of 256GB, 512GB, or 1TB.
The iPhone 15 Plus features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip, dual 48MP rear cameras, 6GB RAM, and storage options of 128GB, 256GB, or 512GB.
The iPhone 15 Pro Max - 24KT Gold Edition features a 6.7-inch display, A17 Pro chip, 8GB RAM, up to 1TB storage, and a 24KT gold finish.
The Redmi Note 13 Pro Plus 5G features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, Dimensity 920 processor, triple 108MP rear cameras, 8GB RAM, and up to 256GB storage.
The Redmi Note 13 features a 6.67-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 700 processor, dual 50MP rear cameras, 6GB RAM, and up to 128GB storage.
The Redmi Note 13, priced at 16,499 BDT, features a 6.67-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 700 processor, dual 50MP rear cameras, 6GB RAM, and 128GB storage.
The Redmi A3 features a 6.53-inch display, MediaTek Helio G25 processor, dual 13MP rear cameras, 3GB RAM, and 32GB storage.
The Redmi 13C features a 6.71-inch display, MediaTek Helio G85 processor, dual 50MP rear cameras, 4GB RAM, and up to 128GB storage.
The Redmi Note 12 features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 678 processor, dual 48MP rear cameras, 4GB RAM, and up to 128GB storage.
The Xiaomi 12 Pro features a 6.73-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, triple 50MP rear cameras, 8GB RAM, and up to 256GB storage.
The Google Pixel 9 Pro XL features a 6.8-inch OLED display, Google Tensor G3 chip, triple 50MP rear cameras, 12GB RAM, and up to 1TB storage.
The Google Pixel 9 features a 6.7-inch OLED display, Google Tensor G3 chip, dual 50MP rear cameras, 8GB RAM, and up to 512GB storage.
Budget-friendly smartphone with MediaTek Helio G80, 6GB RAM, and 128GB storage.
The Google Pixel 7 Pro features a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, Google Tensor G2 chip, triple 50MP rear cameras, 12GB RAM, and up to 512GB storage.
Google Pixel 4a 5G features a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display, Google Tensor G2 chip, triple 50MP rear cameras, 12GB RAM, and up to 512GB storage.
